channel.title: Part 2--The Tao or True Nature is Nothingness on Tao Te Ching Simplified
channel.description: Recent content in Part 2--The Tao or True Nature is Nothingness on Tao Te Ching Simplified

item.title: Chapter 4--The Tao is Nirguna or Nothingness
item.description: 1 The Tao is like the emptiness of a vessel. In our use of it, we must be on our guard against all fullness. How deep and unfathomable it is, as if it were the Honoured Ancestor of all things! 2 We should blunt our sharp points, and unravel the complications of things. We should attemper our brightness, and bring ourselves into agreement with the obscurity of others. How pure and still the Tao is, as if it would ever so continue!
